thread.section_title: Hotel de la Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel
thread.title_full: Good hotel - Review of Hotel de la Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kelly G
title: Good hotel
text: I stayed there with a friend for 3 nights, I didn't have breakfast there, we bought stuff at the supermarket bread, juices, etc. The room is small and cozy, it doesn't have a microwave or fridge. Good views, from the window you can see the tower changing colors at night. The hotel has elevators. Overall good price and close to the tower.
